title: Apple Litigation Is Very Lucrative for Some Firms
description:
A Bloomberg Law analysis found that, within the tech industry, Apple uses outside law firms at a rate three times higher than its nearest rival.
But which firms the iPhone maker uses may surprise you. On this episode of On The Merits, we hear from three Bloomberg Law reporters about why the Silicon Valley giant steers a large portion of its legal business toward two small-to-mid-size Southern law firms.
Do you have feedback on this episode of On The Merits? Give us a call and leave a voicemail at 703-341-3690.
